response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value for you, just like it does for us. Considering its worth, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. We believe this is a fair and competitive offer, allowing you to enjoy all its benefits without straining your budget. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
